greeting.0: *squawk squawk* I am the progeny of The Great Albatross.

albatross.0: *squawk squawk* The Great Albatross knows all.

event.0: *squawk squawk* You are truly awakened, please offer this giant fish up to my father should you see him. May he bless you with his divine auspices.

end.0: *squawk squawk* You exist in a state of ignorance, there is no getting through to you.

greeting.0: Hi, welcome to Nemo's! How can I help you?

nice.0: Um, I'm sorry, I don't really know a lot about surf boards. Maybe when my manager gets back he can help you.

manager.0: Oh here he is now, why don't you ask him?

alexa.0: I just moved out here from the big city, things sure are different here. I appreciate the slower pace of life.

city.0: Central City is located in the, well, the center of the continent. I had to leave because things got dangerous there.

danger.0: Well, gangs of cyberpunks have all but taken over the city, it's a mess. The wizards try to keep the punks in check, but it seems the old men are losing their grip.

russ.0: Russ has a kind heart but the things he says sometimes get him into trouble.
russ.1: <button id='greeting' class='dialogue'>Tell me about it, what else is new?</button>

greeting.0: *without taking his eyes off his deck* What do you want?
How can I help you today?

franny.0: Well, my name is Franny Dee, I've been working here since I was a teenager. I know almost everyone in town, and I've never seen you before.
franny.1: <button id='greeting' class='dialogue'>Pleased to meet you Franny!</button>

town.0: Oh, I don't know. This town is really weird. First of all, it doesn't have a name, it 'goes by many names'. And then there's the cyberpunks and wizards running around. Oh, I don't know, don't get me started on The Witch House.

name.0: People call the town by many names but nobody can quite agree on what the name really is. At the town's founding the debate around the town's name was so fierce that a small battle was drawn between the debating factions, in the ensuing battle over 33 men lost their lives. The town has remained Unnamed ever since.

cyber.0: Oh, you know, cyberpunk is the latest trend, but it truly is a massive movement. A lot of kids and even adults are absolutely sucked into these technologies. On the other hand, the wizards cannot stand the cyberpunks. The wizards claim the cyberpunks are using a forbidden form of dark sorcery in their devices, meanwhile the cyberpunks contend that the wizards are out of touch old-timer know-nothings.

house.0: The Witch House? Just outside of town? I figured you were here after you saw that movie they made about it. It's not really a tourist attraction. There's a bunch of messed up urban legends about it. I've never been there myself, locals know to stay away.

greeting.0: Hey! Can't you see that we're busy here!? Be a doll and run this tray of food over to those kids in the corner!

accept.0: Thank you sweet heart, I'll make it up to you, I promise.

greeting.0: Okay, can you do something else for me? See that man at the counter? He's a regular, been coming for years, could you please go over and let him know his food is on the way?

accept.0: Thank you sweet heart, I'll make it up to you, I promise.

greeting.0: *whew* Seems like the rush is finally over. Thanks to you I can finally relax! Here's a hamburger and milkshake, on the house.

accept.0: Anytime, how else can I help you today?

greeting.0: *whew* I'm bushed, you are quite proficient in magic my young friend.

blizzardWizard.0: I would really prefer if you would not call me The Blizzard Wizard. My true name is known to no man, but you can call me Cryan.

wizards.0: We wizards have been in this world since the start. We exist alongside the civilization you know so well guiding the humans towards their ultimate destiny.

destiny.0: The fate of your species is unknown, even to us. We are simply the hand that guides you to the end.

evil.0: Some wizards are good and others are evil. The wizards of The Wizards Tower are of the evil sort. I myself am somewhere in between.

wizardTower.0: The Wizard's Tower has been the stronghold of the dark wizards since time immemorial. None know of the heinous dark arts performed within. None who enter ever exit, and those who abide there always remain within it's confines.

greeting.0: Oh my goodness, is that Master Hallett? You've returned! We feared the worst when The Surprise was lost in that terrible storm. Thank heavens you are alright!

sam.0: You're Samuel Hallett, are you not? The Pirate Prince? Morgan Bellamy's betrothed?

surprise.0: The Surprise! Surely you know your own ship's name!

end.0: Wait while I fetch Master Aubrey, I'm sure the sight of him will bring you to your senses.

greeting.0: * The Black Robed Woman seems not to notice you *

hello.0: * As the woman raises her face to meet yours you notice her mouth is sewn shut. She lunges at you. *

greeting.0: Hello! How can I help you today?

woman.0: What woman? I'm the only person here. Now, would you like a room or not?

haunted.0: That's all just rumours and superstition! I've been living and working here for over 50 years and I've never seen a ghost or anything out of the ordinary. All you need is a good night's sleep to set you right.

sam.0: The Captain Samuel Hallett was a close acquaintance to Captain Aubrey who once called this building home. Captain Hallett is famous for his meteoric rise as a pirate. With the capture of The H.M.S. Surprise in 1717 he went from a nobody to The Prince of Pirates overnight. Sadly the ship and her Captain were lost in a storm in these waters. The ship remains unfound to this day.

ghost.0: That's it, I'm closing that old room upstairs for good!
ghost.1: <button id='greeting' class='dialogue'>I see, let's talk about something else.</button>

greeting.0: * The shadow looms over the bed staring into you. *

help.0: * The shadow bends in closer to your face *

ring.0: * Finally the shadow stands upright and extends an icy hand, it hands you a Simple Ring *

event.0: *Before departing, the shadow whispers* For my beloved.

greeting.0: Hello friend, my name is Jeff. Did you pass out on the beach? Not the first time I've seen a guy like you pass through here.

combat.0: Personally I'm a pacifist, but I do know a little bit about combat. Battles are turn-based and if you don't know what that means at this point I don't think I can help you.

affinity.0: Well, every weapon has type ratings and each enemy has corresponding defenses. The type ratings are Blunt (B), Edged (E), and Piercing (P) you will want to inspect every enemy to determine it's defensive ratings against the various weapon types and gear yourself accordingly. Also, don't worry, inspecting enemies and changing equipment do not waste turns so be sure to use them as much as you'd like.

magic.0: Magic spells and skills are learned by reading comics and magazines, these can be found in the world or purchased from shops. Each magic spell has an affinity and does elemental type based damage. I can't remember where I've heard something like that before but it's familiar, right?

rage.0: One last thing, using physical attacks will increase your RAGE, RAGE is neccessary to use skills, but be careful if your rage gets high it will have unwanted consequences. Similarly, casting spells will decrease your Sanity, you will need items to keep your sanity in check as you cast more spells, don't want to lose it, do you?

exit.0: This is the beach meadow, I have been living here for many years. There is a path to town to the North. You'll have to walk through the Seaside Forest to get to town, some nasty monsters in there.

items.0: Items are split up into three classes: consumable, usable, and equipable. Consumables are items that can be used to recover stats, heal, and learn spells or skills. Usable items can be used on targets in the world to trigger events and unlock new parts of the game. Equipable items work exactly how they sound, they can be equipped to modify stats like attack and defense.

world.0: Strange tidings greet the world these days. Strange lights in the sky at night, monsters in the forests becoming aggressive. The wizards are planning something, I know it. I wish I could get more information but I'm not getting anything on the radio today. I think there's something wrong with the antennae.

world2.0: The World is populated by a few classes of interactables: Info nodes are not interactive but will reveal additional information about the world upon inspection, objects are interactable items that modify scenes revealing new paths and items, sometimes objects will require an additional usable item to work, items can also be found which can be picked up and added to the inventory, enemies are targets which can be fought to advance the story and gain experience and additional items, lastly characters such as myself can be talked to, conversations reveal important information and advance the story so be sure to talk to everyone you meet!

unlock.0: There's some stuff in my van you could use, feel free to take a look.

albatrossLives.0: All I know is The Great Albatross resides far to the North in a snowy domain. Some believe it is some sort of god, he's got a whole cult of followers.

albatrossDies.0: All I know is The Great Albatross resides far to the North in a snowy domain. Some believe it is some sort of god, he's got a whole cult of followers.

greeting.0: Hey man, where are you from?

home.0: I was born in this town and I've hated it every day since. You don't know where you're from? We should chill sometime and try to figure it out.

joe.0: All I like to do is skate, smoke weed and play video games.

witch.0: *whispers* You shouldn't talk about that, man. She's always listening.

witch2.0: The Witch, dude! Don't tell me you haven't heard the legends.

witch3.0: Oh man, she'll tear your eyes out! The Witch has haunted that house out East since before my parents were born.

high.0: That is truly bizarre. You can't even remember your own name? Huh, sounds like you were made for this town.

you.0: Like I said, I've lived here since I was born and I'm gonna get as far away from this town as humanly possible.

town.0: Like I said, this town sucks. It doesn't even have a name. I just want to get out of here. I just want to see the world!

weed.0: Dude that would be sick. I wonder if there are planets out there with sugary oceans.

candy.0: I don't really like sweets myself, but I can't turn down a butterfinger.

ocean.0: The ocean is pretty big dude. Like bigger than you can imagine big. I wouldn't be surprised if it goes on forever.

greeting.0: * In the mirror you see yourself wearing a twisted grin. He is not you. He looks you directly in the eye as you gaze into the mirror. His grin twists till his face fills with deep lines. He reaches behind his back and produces a stout stiletto dagger. He touches the tip before plunging the knife deep into his heart. You feel the impact of the blade as it pierces a hole through your chest. *

look.0: * The other you continues slamming the stiletto into his chest and abdomen as you writhe on the ground feeling your body being ventilated by the blade. *

keepLooking.0: * Finally the other you stops and goes limp. He is dead. You realize that you are alive. Despite the writhing agony of the blade, you have survived! *

greeting.0: * In the mirror you see yourself, but an idealized version of your self. He is like you if you were smarter, fitter, and more handsome. He is also a few inches taller than you. He looks you in the eyes and then begins to look at you, the inferior version. He approaches you through the mirror and extends a hand through it. *

look.0: * The idealized you takes your hand, looks you in the eyes and gives you a firm handshake. 'This is what you look like when you're happy. You are enough.' He says, smiling slightly as he nods to you in approval and departs. *

greeting.0: Thank you, with the demise of the black witch I am freed.
Hello, young man, my name is Willard, how are you today?

oldMan.0: I love coming to this diner, the food is fantastic.

greeting.0: Hello young man, how may I help you today?

surf.0: Sure thing, what are you looking for? A long board? A short board? A fish? Oh, where to get started? Can I interest you in a gun, every citizen should own one.

guns.0: Guns are fantastic, I just can't stop talking about guns. They're fun to shoot and keep you safe, and if you want to hunt you'll need one.

greeting.0: Oh, hello there. Sorry I was lost in the flowers. It's a beautiful arrangement, don't you think?

flowers.0: Thank you! It's a lot of work but I try to keep the trees happy and flowers flourishing. I'm happy with the current arrangement but there's something missing.

missing.0: Well there's a species of scarlet flower indigenous to the area around The Witch House out East. Nobody goes there so they are almost impossible to come by. I would go myself but I can't make the trek through the marsh to get there. It's not the legends about The Witch House that get me, it's the monsters in the marsh. If I were you I would take a nice rest at Aubrey's Inn you'll need all your strength to get through the marsh.

witchHouse.0: Oh geez, he doesn't know? The Witch House is a local legent. There's an old vacant house out by the point, it's been there for ages. One night a terrible storm hit and flooded all the land between here and that old Bellamy house. Since that day all the land's turned to marsh but The Witch House remains standing where it always has, on a lonenly cliff by the ocean.

marsh.0: The marsh is populated by Bog People. They're nasty buggers, always lurking about the grass covered in mud, I can't stand the sight of them. The only time they go away is during a thunderstorm, the lightning seems to scare them.

albatrossLives.0: It is my life's goal to one day see The Great Albatross. Those that have seen it have said the sight is unbelievable.

albatrossDies.0: Recently, the somber cries of The Great Albatross can be heard all over the continent. I wonder what happened to make it so sad.

greeting.0: Hi there, my name is Matt, but everyone around here calls me The Shermanator.
greeting.2: <button id='matt' class='dialogue'>What can you tell me about yourself?</button>

nice.0: Sure, we sell comics of all kinds, fantasy comics like Office-Man are all the rage right now. People need an escape given everything going on in the world.

benefits.0: Yes! Reading comics teaches you a lot about the world, you can even learn valuable skills and spells from reading comics.

matt.0: I'm a pretty regular guy. I love reading comics and wearing shorts. I like shorts! They're comfy and easy to wear!

greeting.0: Hello I am Name.

naughty.0: I no longer wish to speak with you, goodbye.

weed.0: Can you imagine if the sea was sweet instead of salty?
